prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Piano, Guitar, Brass, Organ, but without Drums.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Bass, Piano, Guitar, Brass, and Organ, but no Drums.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Bass, Piano, Guitar, Brass, and Organ, omitting Drums.

Style 3:
This composition is comprised of Bass, Piano, Guitar, Brass, and Organ, excluding Drums.
